data.message:
Proud of you for standing up against social injustices. These people were never truly your fans because you've ALWAYS been down with the movement. All they were to you was another artist who should have stuck to music.

Eminem stick to music.
Athlete stick to sports. 
Actors and Actresses stick to Acting. 
But for some reason they all didn’t tell Trump to stick to reality TV and bankruptcy. 🤔🤔🤔🤔

replies.message:
Movement? What movement?

Wtf have any of these people done for you, anyone you know or anyone you have even heard of?

Eminem isn't brave. He brushed off maybe 5% of his fan base to boost the popularity with the other 95%. Talking shit about someone that 45% of the people and 95% of your fan base is already talking shit about is about as pussy as it gets. 

If he was brave he would have said at least something while Obama was in. Yet... fuck all.
